title: Reference .NET Framework 481 as latest when msbuild bumps major versions
body:
We need to bump this during the next major version.

_Originally posted by @BenVillalobos in https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/7689#discussion_r1021888525_


#7689 could not bump `VersionLatest` because that is a breaking change we don't want to do in minor version bumps. The next major version bump should point `VersionLatest` to `Version481`.
